edge: Wayans, Open Road Films, and IM Global Octane announced the production of a sequel due to the financial success of the first film.
On May 3, 2013, it was confirmed that A Haunted House 2 would be released on March 28, 2014.
On August 24, 2013, it was announced that Jaime Pressly had joined the cast of the film.
On August 24, 2013, it was announced that Ashley Rickards had joined the cast of the film.
On August 24, 2013, it was announced that Gabriel Iglesias had joined the cast of the film.
Principal photography and production for A Haunted House 2 began on August 26, 2013, and ended on September 29, 2013.
On January 18, 2014, the film was pushed back to April 18, 2014 and then back to its March 28 date.
